name: Export after repair/replacement under warranty: military goods
usageSummary: Export military items that have been temporarily in the UK for repair or replacement under warranty.

name: Export for repair/replacement under warranty: military goods
usageSummary: Export previously imported military items for repair or replacement under warranty, provided they will then be returned to the UK.

name: Export after exhibition or demonstration: military goods
usageSummary: Export military items that have been temporarily in the UK for demonstration purposes.

name: Exports or transfers in support of UK government defence contracts
usageSummary: Export or transfer items in support of UK government defence contracts.

name: Military and dual-use goods: UK forces deployed in non-embargoed destinations
usageSummary: Export or transfer military and dual-use items to UK armed forces or Ministry of Defence civilians operating in non-embargoed countries.

name: Historic military goods
usageSummary: Export historic military goods manufactured before 1897, up to a value of Â£35,000.
